description:
High Performance 4x4 Lighting

A hugely effective upgrade for your new 4WD rig is to fit good quality 4x4 LED lights. Automax are exclusive dealers for the renowned Stedi 4x4 lights in Coffs Harbour. Stedi are an Australian company that specialises in LED lighting that will light up your adventures. We stock the full range of Stedi lights including spot lights, light bars, fog lights, working lights and headlight conversions. Essentially, the addition of our great value LED lighting will provide peace of mind, enhance your safety, and conveniently light up your campsite wherever you are. [su_spoiler title="More"]

The Top 3 Benefits of Additional 4WD LED Lighting

  1. Safety Getting into the outback or exploring remote forest trails is exciting. Make sure you look after your safety too with incredibly bright LED lights. 4x4 LED lights help you spot the hazards, look further, and are great for lighting up your campsite.
  2. Low Power Consumption LED lights use a fraction of the power that traditional lights use.
  3. Durability and Performance LED light bars and working lights are built to last. Not only are the casings made to withstand impact and harsh conditions, but the LED units themselves are far brighter and last much longer than older-style lights.

Call in For a Demo of Stedi 4x4 Lights in Coffs Harbour

Come and see our range of Stedi 4x4 lights in action at our Showroom in Coffs Harbour. We carry the complete range for you to experience. We are sure you’ll be impressed with their performance and value. Furthermore, because we have our own workshop, we can also fit them too.

Automax 4x4 Accessories and Services

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop for everything 4WD in Coffs Harbour, we offer the following services:

  1. 4x4 Accessories advice, supply and fitting
  2. 4x4 Bullbars from Rhino, AFN, Uneek, Rival by Drivetech, Rockarmour and More
  3. 4x4 Rear Bars & Tow Bars including sales and fitting
  4. 4x4 Sliders and Side steps, brands we stock are AFN, Rhino, Rockarmour
  5. 4x4 Lighting. We offer the best 4WD LED Lighting by Stedi Lights
  6. 4x4 Suspension by Outback Armour and Boss Air Suspension
  7. 4x4 Winches & Recovery Gear by Runva, Rhino, Drivetech & Outback Armour
  8. 4x4 Vehicle repair, servicing and 4WD upgrades in Coffs Harbour
Call into our Showroom or Contact us today for expert and friendly guidance on our great range of 4x4 Lights in Coffs Harbour.
[/su_spoiler]
